Permissions
Allow permissions for wired Android Auto

"These permissions allow Android Auto to:
• Connect to the car via USB • Send and receive car display data • Launch apps that have opted-in to Android Auto on the car display • Reset the USB port and to reconnect the connected USB devices "
Allow to reroute audio from device to the car
This permission will allow Android Auto to reroute audio playback and audio capture from device to the car. Audio capture will be allowed only if the Microphone permission is allowed.
Allow permissions for wireless Android Auto

"These permissions allow Android Auto to:
• Connect and interact with Bluetooth, Wi-Fi and USB devices • Reset the USB port and to reconnect the connected USB devices • Toggle Wi-Fi and Bluetooth on or off • Access the list of Wi-Fi networks • Connect to Wi-Fi networks without confirmation • Read the device serial number, Bluetooth MAC address, Wi-Fi MAC address • Send and receive car display data • Launch apps that have opted-in to Android Auto on the car display
The network permission will also be allowed, it’s needed for communication with the car over Wi-Fi. "
Allow permissions for handling phone calls

"These permissions allow Android Auto to:
• Place and answer phone calls • Manage ongoing phone calls • Enable and disable Bluetooth • Pair and connect with the car’s hands-free audio system via Bluetooth "
